description: Partial details required by Condition 8 Part (B) (Alterations to Western Elevation of Walkden Hall) of Planning Permission 19/01076/FUL (Erection of single storey building for use as a management suite and reception. Internal and external alterations to existing buildings to facilitate refurbishment of existing student accommodation, including installation of PV panels, with associated parking and landscaping arrangements.)
decision_conditions: Inspection: Site inspection carried out as a desktop exercise with information provided by the applicant as supporting material to application.Assessment: The works proposed are acceptable and will not have an adverse effect on the trees or reduce their amenity value. Recommendation: No objections.

Please submit the 'Supporting Statement' to explain the wall insulation type, details and other information. The information in the cover letter 'Wetherby External Wall Insulation System with Brick Slips' does not co-relate with the proposed drawings.
